title: Pink Starts Shedding Her Pregnancy Weight – and Wants to Drop 30 Pounds After Birth of Son Jameson
text:
Eight weeks after giving birth toÂ son Jameson ,Â Pink Â has seen the first of her pregnancy weight disappear.
The 37-year-old Grammy winner has spent the past two weeks working out alongside trainerÂ Jeanette Jenkins . And on Wednesday, Pink shared with her Instagram followers that sheâ€™s already down 5 pounds.
â€œCommitment,â€ the mother-of-two captioned an Instagram gym selfie .
While Pinkâ€™s beenÂ getting back into her fitness routine, she said she stillÂ has a ways to go. In fact, the singer â€” nĂŠe Alecia Moore â€” said she wants to lose 30 more pounds. â€œ#5down30togomâ€ she wrote.
RELATED VIDEO:Â Pink Explains Why Her Daughter Is Way Cooler Than Her 
Pink previously worked with Jenkins to lose her baby weight after giving birth to herÂ daughter Willow Â in 2011. Jenkins helped her to lose 50 lbs.
â€œWe trained five times a week,â€ Jenkins previously told PEOPLE . â€œWe mixed it up. It was a combination of strength training, flexibility work. We did yoga and Pilates.â€
As Pink hits the gym, her husbandÂ Carey Hart Â is in on babysitting duty. On Wednesday, the 41-year-old retired motocross racer took his 8-week-old son to work with him.
â€œJamo putting in some shop time with pop yesterday,â€ Hart captioned a Wednesday Instagram snap of himself and hisÂ son â€”Â the latter of whom rested his face up on a towel. â€œMy motorcycle lift doubles well as a changing table!!â€
